settings.popup_text: Be the first to know about new items, sales and get exclusive offers.

settings.heading: Sara Schelde Faust
settings.textarea:
Sara Schelde kan godt lide pizza og er særligt glad for kattekillinger.
I sin fritid er hun glad for at gå lange ture og at spille puslespil.

settings.title: What is KIOSK48TH?
settings.text:
KIOSK48TH is a Danish webshop providing carefully curated design and interior items. 
Every item has its own story and contributes to a playful, constantly evolving, and creative space.

settings.title: How do I shop in my local currency?
settings.text:
You can change the currency of the webshop in the bottom of the page on mobile or in the top right corner on your computer.

Look for DKK kr. and tap to select either CAD $, DKK kr., EUR €, GBP £ or USD $.

settings.title: I made a typo when I placed my order. What to do?
settings.text: Send us an email on hello@kiosk48th.com and we’ll update your information right away.

settings.title: Can I make changes to my order?
settings.text:
Yes - we can easily change your order or add more items, as long as it has not been dispatched yet.
Simply send an email to hello@kiosk48th.com with your order number.

settings.title: How do I cancel my order?
settings.text:
Cancellation of orders must be done in writing to hello@kiosk48th.com with no exceptions. Remember to include your order number.

Please be aware that it is only possible to cancel your order, if we have not processed it yet.

settings.title: Do you ship worldwide?
settings.text:
Yes, we ship almost worldwide.
If you experience that your shipping country is missing on the list at checkout, please contact us on hello@kiosk48th.com and we will be happy to set it up immediately.

settings.title: Do you ship to the UK after Brexit?
settings.text:
Yes!

We are now ready to ship to the UK again after a few issues.

There are some new rules we have to pay attention to regarding Brexit, therefore we are only able to ship orders for UK with a minimum of  £135 / 1130 DKK.

Please note that import charges are not included and might be added at the UK customs. For more informations regarding import contact the UK government. 

And we still have free shipping to a DPD pick-up point for UK orders.

settings.title: Do you offer free shipping?
settings.text:
Yes, we do offer free shipping to most countries.

Denmark:
Free shipping on orders over 499 DKK

Europe:
Free shipping on orders over €150 / 1115 DKK*

Rest of the World:
Free shipping on orders over 325 USD / 1975 DKK**

* We offer free shipping to the following countries in Europe:
Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Hungary, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Monaco, Netherlands, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Spain, Sweden, United Kingdom

** We offer free shipping to the following countries outside Denmark and Europe:
Canada, China, Hong Kong SAR, India, Indonesia, Israel, Japan, Qatar, Saudi Arabia, Singapore, South Korea, Taiwan, Thailand, United Arab Emirates, United States

settings.title: What is the delivery cost?
settings.text:
The delivery cost depends on the shipping destination along with the weight of the order.

For detailed information, please visit our Shipping page here.

settings.title: How long will it take for my order to arrive?
settings.text:
We strive to send all orders within 1-4 business days, but most often we’re shipping orders the same day as they’re placed.
Delivery time depends on the shipping destination.

Denmark:
1-3 business days.

Europe:
2-7 business days.

World:
7-20 business days.

Note: Due to COVID-19 you may experience delays in some countries.

We keep ourselves updated with the situation in the different countries. Please send us an e-mail on hello@kiosk48th.com, if you got questions for delivery in your area.

settings.title: What carriers do you use?
settings.text:
Orders for Denmark, Sweden and Norway are dispatched with Postnord.

Orders for Europe are dispatched with Postnord and will on arrival at the shipping country be handed over to DPD.

International orders are dispatched with Postnord and will on arrival the shipping country be handed over to the national postal services.

Orders to the United States are dispatched with DHL Express with a delivery time of approx 7 days.

settings.title: Can I pick up my order on your address?
settings.text: Yes, you can easily pick up your order. When checking out choose “Pick up”, and we will send you an email when your order is ready for you to pick up.

settings.title: Do you have an express delivery service?
settings.text: We can definitely set up an international Express delivery with DHL for you. Please send an email to hello@kiosk48th.com, as this is not standard by checkout.

settings.title: Are import taxes included?
settings.text:
As a standard procedure, international delivery charges are estimated and these are based on a kerbside delivery only with Duty Unpaid. Therefore, you as a customer are liable for any import duties and/or local taxes that may be added.

Unfortunately KIOSK48TH is unable to offer guidance on duties or taxes. We recommend that you contact your local import office for help.

settings.title: An item has broken in shipping, what do I do?
settings.text:
Please send us an email with your order number (to be found in the order confirmation) along with a photo of the broken item, and we’ll find a suitable solution as soon as possible.

You can reach out at hello@kiosk48th.com.

settings.title: How do I make a return?
settings.text:
You have the possibility to return the item(s) and cancel your purchase within 14 days after you have received your order. Send us an email on hello@kiosk48th.com with your order number and information about the item(s) you wish to return.

Your shipping costs will not be refunded by KIOSK48TH and the shipping cost on the original order will not be refunded. Return parcels which have not been picked up at pick-up points will be handled as a return parcel - the original shipping cost and the return cost will not be refunded by KIOSK48TH.

Please note that all products must be returned in the same condition as when they were purchased. Any used, broken product packaging (including stickers), damaged goods or products that show signs of wear and use will not be accepted. It is the customer’s responsibility to make sure the goods are in the same condition as when purchased.

settings.title: Where is KIOSK48TH located?
settings.text: KIOSK48TH is located in Denmark, close to Silkeborg, as well as we ship all our orders from Denmark.

settings.title: Do you have a physical store?
settings.text:
No, at the moment we do not have a physical store, but if you live nearby you are more than welcome to pick up your order at our address.

If you wish to experience a product, please contact us and we will be happy to send more images.

settings.title: Do you do wholesale?
settings.text:
No, currently we don’t work with any wholesaler partners or distributors.
For any inquiries about wholesale and B2B, please contact pr@kiosk48th.com.
Free shipping
Hassle-free returns
